alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 23 at 4:45AM CST until January 24 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE FOR MOST OF DEEP SOUTH TEXAS TUESDAY... .Critical fire weather conditions will be possible for most of Deep South Texas Tuesday afternoon into Tuesday evening with low relative humidity values and strong northwesterly winds behind a cold front. A Red Flag Warning may be needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, CURED FUELS, AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR PORTIONS OF DEEP SOUTH TEXAS... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 248 Zapata, Fire Weather Zone 249 Jim Hogg, Fire Weather Zone 250 Brooks, Fire Weather Zone 251 Inland Kenedy, Fire Weather Zone 252 Starr, Fire Weather Zone 253 Southern Hidalgo, Fire Weather Zone 254 Inland Willacy and Fire Weather Zone 353 Northern Hidalgo. * TIMING...12 PM to 10 PM. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 21 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 70. * LIGHTNING...Very low chance. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr; Zapata
